ygData.subject: Re: Gathering
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiyas! I d be making a trip down once I hit the 11th Circle. I spoke to Trifrost as well.  Maybe he would make the trip down with me together
ygData.messageBody:
Hiyas!

I'd be making a trip down once I hit the 11th Circle. I spoke to Trifrost as well. <Barbarian Shaman> Maybe he would make the trip down with me together with my Half-Elf friend. But that would be the first SAT in June.

Wilson
----- Original Message -----
From: Leshrec
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 2:12 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Gathering


It would be sweet to meet each other but I think those in Qeynos or ard that area would have trouble coming to Freeport. Heard the journey is very dangerous and have to cross many zones. So unless yer level 8 or above, please don't try to make your way to Freeport from Qeynos yourself unless you have someone with you.
